author: Jess Joho
title: Don't work from home alone. Try these virtual desktop buddies :)
description: Remember desktop pets? In the very early days of the web, they came in many forms ( cats, ants, cockroaches, even spyware ), all of them cute little pixels who just hung out on your screen to keep you company. It made the strange, isolating new world wide web…
